ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] what good is a 40 shaman?
ygData.msgSnippet: For the record, this forum is not for trading accounts. While this isn t as annoying as the ones where people ask for real money for their account, I am now
ygData.messageBody:
For the record, this forum is not for trading accounts. While this isn't as
annoying as the ones where people ask for real money for their account, I am
now requesting that no further account trades/sales be advertised on this
list.
Why am I against the trading? I have heard of people who bought accounts and
then got screwed by the account holder. Maybe I'm just paranoid, but it is
still not a safe thing to do for the person who wants to get the account.
So no more of this.
luv,
-Su


No, I am not selling this account for money.
But I have a 40 shaman account (on the nameless server) and am done
with it. I do not want to keep paying for it, as I never use it, but
I feel funny about just letting it.die. So, I'd like someone that
could use it to take it over. Now, I am looking for some sort of
compensation. NO real money, but a donation to my guild in the way of
platinum or gear would be well considered. Do not ask me how much or
what items - I don't know. If you are interested, just send an email
to me at z_elder@... saying "I would like to donate 25k to your
cause in exchange for the account" or whatever.




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com


Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
